verses.verse: <S%H575>"Where<s%> has your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H1980>gone,<s%> O most <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>? <S%H575>Where<s%> has your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H6437>turned,<s%> That we may <S%H1245>seek<s%> him with you?"

"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> has <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to his <S%H1588>garden,<s%> To the <S%H6170>beds<s%> of <S%H1314>balsam,<s%> To <S%H7462>pasture<s%> [his flock] in the <S%H1588>gardens<s%> And <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>
"I am my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>'s and my beloved is mine, He who <S%H7462>pastures<s%> [his flock] among the <S%H7799>lilies.<s%>"

"You are as <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> as <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> As <S%H5000>lovely<s%> as <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> As <S%H366>awesome<s%> as an <S%H1713>army<s%> with <S%H1713>banners.<s%>

<S%H5437>"Turn<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5437>away<s%> from me, For they have <S%H7292>confused<s%> me; Your <S%H8181>hair<s%> is like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%> That have <S%H1570>descended<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

"Your <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are like a <S%H5739>flock<s%> of <S%H7353>ewes<s%> <S%H7945>Which<s%> have <S%H5927>come<s%> up from [their] <S%H7367>washing,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of <S%H7945>which<s%> <S%H8382>bear<s%> <S%H8382>twins,<s%> And not <S%H369>one<s%> among them has <S%H9599>lost<s%> her <S%H9599>young.<s%>
"Your <S%H7541>temples<s%> are like a <S%H6400>slice<s%> of a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H4480>Behind<s%> <S%H1157><s%> your <S%H6777>veil.<s%>

[But] my <S%H3123>dove,<s%> my <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H8535>one,<s%> is <S%H259>unique:<s%> She is her mother's <S%H259>only<s%> [daughter;] She is the <S%H1249>pure<s%> [child] of the one who <S%H3205>bore<s%> her. The <S%H1323>maidens<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her and <S%H833>called<s%> her <S%H833>blessed,<s%> The <S%H4436>queens<s%> and the <S%H6370>concubines<s%> [also,] and they <S%H1984>praised<s%> her, [saying,]

<S%H4310>'Who<s%> is <S%H384>this<s%> that <S%H8259>grows<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> the <S%H7837>dawn,<s%> As <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> as the <S%H3842>full<s%> <S%H3842>moon,<s%> As <S%H1249>pure<s%> as the <S%H2535>sun,<s%> As <S%H366>awesome<s%> as an <S%H1713>army<s%> with <S%H1713>banners<s%>?'

"I <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1593>orchard<s%> of <S%H93>nut<s%> <S%H93>trees<s%> To <S%H7200>see<s%> the blossoms of the <S%H3>valley,<s%> To <S%H5158>see<s%> whether the <S%H7200>vine<s%> had <S%H1612>budded<s%> [Or] the <S%H6524>pomegranates<s%> had <S%H7416>bloomed.<s%>
"Before I was <S%H3045>aware,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> me [Over] the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of my <S%H5081>noble<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

<S%H7725>"Come<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> O <S%H7759>Shulammite;<s%> <S%H7725>Come<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> that we may <S%H2372>gaze<s%> at you!" <S%H4100>"Why<s%> should you <S%H2372>gaze<s%> at the <S%H7759>Shulammite,<s%> As at the <S%H4246>dance<s%> of the two <S%H4264>companies<s%>?
